docs.text: i have never been so confused after watching a movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " meet joe black " is probably one of the most visually satisfying films of this year , with a cinematography , music and cast that will dazzle most of us .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at the same time it is probably the most boring and ridiculous experience hat you will have this season .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: at first you marvel at the elegant direction , graceful cinematography and sensual musical score .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: then you'll wait for something to happen for half an hour , but when you finally understand what's going on , you'll wonder what are actors such as anthony hopkins , brad pitt and claire forlani are doing in a film like this ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the script is simply a silly and unresolved story , which is artificially stretched into a three hour long motion picture .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it feels like an eternity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: most of the time it is a pompous soap opera , filled with empty dialogue that the actors deliver in a high pitched voice and " meaningful " winks .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film is based on alberto caesella's play " death takes a holiday " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the story concentrates around bill ( anthony hopkins ) who lives a fulfilled life as a successful business man , but sometimes he wakes up in the middle of the night and hears a voice that is saying " yes " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: soon he meets a young elegant gentlemen ( brad pitt ) who introduces himself as " death " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is bill's time .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but death has other plans .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it has come down to us simple mortals to find out what it means to be alive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: our bill is chosen to be death's guide and in exchange he gets time .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bill introduces death as joe black , who immediately becomes the center of everyone's attention .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bill's business partners speculate about why joe is constantly at bill's side , lives in his house and resides at his office .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that is not all , however .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: bill's youngest daughter susan ( claire forlani ) falls in love with the mysterious stranger and joe falls in love with her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this relationship is bound to have some serious consequences .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it wouldn't be fair to say that this film didn't have some interesting moments , such as the scene where joe is invited to join bill's family for dinner .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when joe starts enjoying peanut butter and later falls in love , the experience is somewhat different .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is obvious that a story like this story is very difficult to structure .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's one thing to say : " wouldn't it be fun to have death take human form and come down to earth . . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to create a motion picture out of this is another .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: four screenwriters have worked on a script that lacks drive and logic .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is overlong and too primitive to pass as a serious film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on the other hand it demonstrates incredible performances and a very decent direction by martin brest ( " scent of a woman " ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: hopkins looks great in any role , and no matter how shallow or hollow it is , he will complete it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his talent and charisma are needed here more than any where else , since it actually saves the film from a complete embarrassment .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but pitt is the one that got one of the most difficult roles of recent time .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: how can you play death in human form ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to me it seems that death and life are not something that can be associated with earthly matters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are not creatures , but phenomenas .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: saying that death takes human form would be the same as to suggest that eternity would take human form .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: handling such a ridiculous task is incredibly difficult and pitt deserves some credit for his work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: speaking in a calm , soft voice , portraying death as a lonely , distant and powerful guy that is unfamiliar with practical earthly matters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he looks and acts more like an angel of death , rather than a demon or a red-eyed executioner .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: claire forlani and others are also fine , stretching their stereotypical characters to their limits .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately their performances are not enough to rescue this film from its self inflicted misery .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in other words this is not what i expected from the director of " scent of a woman " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it could ( and should ) be better with such cast and crew .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the end it seems as if they have all been intensively working on a ravishingly looking soap opera .
docs.label: negative
